data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Magway, Myanmar (Burma), show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Magway, Myanmar (Burma)
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Magway, Myanmar (Burma).
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Magway, Myanmar (Burma) to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Magway, Myanmar (Burma).
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Rakhine people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Magway, Myanmar (Burma) a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Magway who will make disciples who make disciples.
Lord, let it be said of the 4,647,793 lost in Magway that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

location.name: Magway
